title: Ukrainian Olympian Is Disqualified Over Helmet With Images of War Dead
summary_full: Olympic officials had told Vladyslav Heraskevych that the helmet, featuring images of people killed in the war with Russia, violated the Games’ ban on political speech.
summary_public: Olympic officials had told Vladyslav Heraskevych that the helmet, featuring images of people killed in the war with Russia, violated the Games’ ban on political speech.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: killed in the war with Russia
